input.name: btnColor
input.label: Button background color (Hex value)
input.help-text: Use a hexadecimal color value for the background of the button (example: "#4286f4"), or a valid color name (example: "red" or "white").

input.name: externalUrl
input.label: Link to: External URL ...
input.help-text: Add an URL to an external source. The URL should begin with "https" or "http". For example https://example.com. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to a page". In case you fill both fields, "Link to a page" has priority.

input.name: btnUrl
input.label: ... or: Link to a page
input.help-text: Select a page that you have already made and want the button to point to. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to a page". In case you fill both fields, "Link to a page" has priority.
